They generate income for their home’s proper functioning and they came up with the idea of a business offering telecommunication services that they gradually expanded; today they also sell school supplies in a commercial spot located in their home.  In addition, Miris works in a cafeteria while her sister-in-law attends SAI [Ministry of the Interior department].  

They started out with three lines of mobile phones and today have six.  The opportunity to expand and strengthen the business is associated to its proximity to schools which makes potential sales of products adjusted to a young population and school employees.  She is planning to buy display cases, phone chargers, mobile phones, room dividers and to sell stationery supplies and fried snacks.

This is precisely the reason behind her calling on her Kiva loan, her first financing with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to carry out all these investments.  Miris’ strength consists in her knowing her business perfectly and that she’s had experience preparing and selling fried products because she used to sell them for four years at stores and at a fixed location before starting this business.

Her business has great growth potential and she’s aware of that because she’s firmly determined to develop it to continue offering her children the opportunity to attain professional, specialized studies.

loans.use: to buy display cases, mobile phones, chargers, room dividers and to sell paper goods an fried snacks.

loans.name: Esterlina

texts.es: Esterlina de 29 años de edad vive en el municipio de Malambo, muy cerca a la ciudad de Barranquilla, con su cónyuge y sus  4 hijas en las edades de 7,8,9 y 10 años. Allí mismo se dedica a la fabricación de sandalias femeninas y de calzado  en cuero y en derivados de este. Su negocio lo inició con su cónyuge quien con su experiencia de trabajo en esta actividad, después de 8 años de ser empleado decidió emprender su propia aventura familiar de negocios en lo que era su gran potencial: hacer calzado. Así fue como en su propia casa organizaron su taller y dividieron las tareas, el dedicado a la guarnición y ella al acabado del producto y al empaque. En sus inicios vendía en almacenes en la ciudad de Barranquilla y con su disciplina de trabajo  mancomunado,  han logrado integrar a su base de datos a 25 almacenes en varias ciudades de la Costa Caribe. Sus principales líneas son el calzado deportivo y formal para damas y caballeros. Así mismo elaboran sandalias deportivas pues esta es su producto estrella y cuenta con una gran demanda en esta línea, la cual vende por docenas. . En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará cuero, sintéticos, suela, gomas, puntillas y adornos, para responde a pedidos que han hecho nuevos almacenes con los cuales desea ser mas oportuna. Su mayor desafío ante su creciente clientela es la falta de capital de trabajo cuando existen temporadas de mayor demanda, como la que se acerca, para celebrar el día de las madres y esta fecha es la que hace que su inversión actual augure mucho éxito en sus ventas y en la rápida rotación de su efectivo.
texts.en:
Esterlina, 29, lives in the town of Malambo very close to the city of Barranquilla with her husband and four daughters whose ages are 7,8,9 and 10 years.  She works manufacturing women’s sandals and shoes out of leather and materials derived from it.  She started her business with her spouse who had experience in this line of work from 8 years of working as an employee and who decided to start their own family business adventure in what had the greatest potential: shoe making.  This was how they set up their shop at home and divided up the tasks: he does the decoration and trimming and she adds the finishing touches and does the packing.

At the beginning they sold in Barranquilla stores and thanks to their disciplined joint work, they’ve managed to add to their data base 25 stores in various cities along the Caribbean coast.  Their main lines are athletic shoes and formal shoes for men and women.  They also make athletic sandals which are their star product and are in very high demand; they sell them by the dozen.

She’s currently applying for a Kiva loan, the first financing she’s had from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to buy leather, synthetics, soles, glue, toe caps and decorations to respond to orders placed by new stores she wants to respond to in a more opportune way.  Her greatest challenge in face of her growing clientele is the lack of working capital when high demand seasons come, like the one that’s approaching to celebrate Mother’s Day, and this date is what augurs much investment success in sales and a quick cash rotation.

loans.use: to buy shoe making supplies.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel is 30 years old and married with four children. She sells various goods such as sugar, biscuits, salt, and cooking oil, and she has been in this business for three years. Her business is open from 6:30 a.m. to 5 p.m. each week.

Maricel has requested a loan of PHP 9,000 in order to purchase various goods such as sugar, biscuits, salt, and cooking oil to sell. With any profits, she will be able to save for her future and she will be able to re-invest in her business.

loans.use: to buy sugar, biscuits, salt, and cooking oil for her store.

loans.name: Phanny's Group

texts.en: Phanny, 34, is married with three children, all of whom are dependent on the family and still in school. Phanny’s family lives in a wooden cottage. Phanny has worked as a farmer for 10 years to support the family. This is her fifth loan with VisionFund. She requested the loan to buy rice seeds and fertilizers for her rice field. With this loan, she hopes to increase the yield of rice and sell it at profit so that she can better support her family and especially her kids’ education. Phanny now leads a loan group of three female members.

loans.use: To buy rice seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Aisulu

texts.ru: Айсулу–участница группы Терек -3. Айсулу 72 года. В качестве  источника дохода для семьи, в 1982 году Айсулу начала  заниматься животноводством.  Имея в хозяйстве 2 дойные коровы и 6 овец, Айсулу имеет ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 5,000 сом (KGS)с продажи молока и молочных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айсулу обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов скота. Доходы Айсулу планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего  хозяйства.
texts.en: Aisulu is a member of the Terek-3 group. She is 72 years old. In 1982, to provide a source of income for her family, she began raising livestock. Currently, with 2 dairy cows and 6 sheep in her herd, Aisulu earns 5,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk and dairy products. In order to continue developing her business, Aisulu has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 40,000 som (KGS) to purchase additional livestock. She plans to invest her profits into further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Carmen Lisseth

texts.es: Carmen Lisseth de 28 años de edad, habita en casa familiar junto con sus hijos y hermana. Carmen  se caracteriza por ser emprendedora, responsable pero sobre todo carismática. Con mucho esfuerzo a logrado mantener su negocio el cual consiste en la venta de zapatos y lociones. La venta  la realiza de manera ambulante en las principales áreas de la zona donde habita. Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos ya que es la única que trabaja debido a que su compañero de vida ya no vive con ellos. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya tiene mucha experiencia en el mismo. Gracias a su carisma se ha ganado la confianza de muchas personas en la zona por lo que ya cuenta con varios clientes fijos. Carmen trabaja muy duro para poder sacar adelante a sus hijos dado que es la única que colabora con la economía del hogar. Su sueño es poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia por lo que se esfuerza para que su negocio siga funcionando de la mejor manera posible. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de mercadería, es decir variedad de zapatos y lociones. Para mantenerlo abastecido y poder dar un mejor servicio a los clientes. Todo esto lo hace con el fin de abarcar una mayor demanda que le permita mejorar sus niveles de venta y de ingresos y por consecuencia poder lograr su sueño de dar a su familia  diferentes oportunidades de vida.
texts.en:
Carmen Lisseth is 28 years old and lives in the family home with her children and her sister. She is known for being enterprising, responsible, but most of all, charismatic. With great effort, she has been able to maintain her business that involves selling shoes and lotions. Her sales are conducted by traveling around the main areas of the district where she lives. This business is her main source of income and her only job since her companion no longer lives with her. Carmen has been in this business for many years and has gained a great deal of experience. Thanks to her charisma, she has earned the trust of many people in the area and now has several established customers. Carmen works very hard to help her children get ahead since she is the only one earning household income. Her dream is to improve her quality of life and that of her family, so she strives to keep her business functioning in the best way possible.

Carmen decided to request this loan from Apoyo Integral so that she can invest in the purchase of merchandise, specifically a variety of shoes and lotions. This will help her remain fully stocked so that she can provide better service to her customers. Her intention is to meet the increased demand, improve her sales, and increase her income so that she accomplish her dream of providing her family with different opportunities in life.

loans.use: to buy shoes and lotions.

loans.name: Delmy Aracely

texts.es: Delmy Aracely de 53 años, soltera vive en casa de su propiedad. Ella se dedica a la venta ambulante de prendas de vestir como: blusas, faldas, camisetas, pantalones etc. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a este negocio y de esta forma se ha ganado la vida ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Es una mujer trabajadora, dedicada y emprendedora. Tiene muchas ideas de negocios las cuales  poco a poco va poniendo en marcha.  Para ella lo más importante es que sus clientes estén satisfechos con el servicio que ofrece ya que reconoce que depende mucho de ellos y en la manera que los mantenga satisfechos continuaran frecuentándola y prefiriendo sus productos. Es por esta razón que ha decidido invertir en su negocio en la compra de variedad de prendas de vestir para surtir su negocio para  que los clientes encuentren siempre lo que busquen.  Dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para hacer la inversión ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para hacer la compra de variedad de prendas de vestir como: faldas, blusas, pantalones, camisetas, y de mas artículos que permitan atraer a más clientes.  Está convencida que con la ayuda de Dios y de esta institución logrará obtener buenos resultados de esta decisión y podrá mejorar sus ganancias las cuales le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Delmy Aracely is 53 years old, single, and lives in her own home. She works as a street merchant and sells clothes such as blouses, skirts, T-shirts, trousers, and other items. Delmy has many years of experience in this business, which has enabled her to earn a living and is her main source of income. She is a hardworking, dedicated, and enterprising woman. Delmy has many ideas for her business that she is gradually implementing. The most important thing for her is to keep her customers satisfied with the service she provides. Much of this depends on her ability to recognize what they need so that they will continue to do business with her and choose her products. For this reason, Delmy has decided to invest in her business by purchasing a variety of clothes. By restocking her business, her customers will always find what they are looking for.

In order to have the necessary financial resources to make this investment, Delmy decided to request a loan from Apoyo Integral. She will be able to buy a variety of clothes such as skirts, blouses, trousers, T-shirts, and other types of garments to attract more customers. With the help of God and Apoyo Integral, Delmy is convinced that she will obtain good results because of her decision. She also expects to increase her earnings so that her quality of life can improve.

loans.use: to buy skirts, blouses, trousers, T-shirts, and other items.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Maribel tiene 28 años, es una mujer trabajadora; vive en compañía de su madre, Elva, y sus 2 hermanas: Celeste y Ariana. Viven en su casa, que es propia y está ubicada en el anexo de San Pedro de Saño. 

Desde joven apoyó a sus padres en las diferentes actividades económicas que realizaban. Como hermana mayor tomó las riendas del hogar, es por eso que hace algunos años abrió una panadería donde comenzó preparando panes, con el tiempo incursionó en la elaboración de pasteles, tortas y otros postres. Le va muy bien en su trabajo, pues recibe la ayuda de su mamá y de sus hermanas. Esto le permitió abrir otro negocio de cabinas de Internet, comenzó con 4 computadoras y ahora ya cuenta con 9. Sus planes son de expandir más sus negocios, invertir en tecnología y comprar máquinas nuevas que le permitan obtener mejores ganancias.

Ella pertenece al banco comunal “San Pedro” y éste es el tercer crédito con MFP. Promete, una vez más, de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su grupo porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias.

Maribel invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de antenas de internet para brindar ese servicio a sus vecinos.
texts.en:
Maribel, 28, is a hardworking woman.  She lives with her mother, Elva, and her two sisters, Celeste and Ariana.  They live in their own house, located in the settlement of San Pedro de Saño.

Since she was little she helped her parents in the different jobs they did.  As the oldest sister she took charge of the household.  This is why several years ago she opened a bakery where she began baking bread.  In time she moved into making cakes, tortes, and other desserts.  It is going very well for her in her job because her mother and her sisters help her.

This allowed her to open another business, an internet cafe.  She began with four computers and now has nine.  Her plans are to expand her business more, invest in technology, and buy new machines to get better profits.

She belongs to the San Pedro communal bank and this is her third loan with MFP.  She promises once again to make her payments.  In addition, it pleases her to be part of her group because all its members are responsible and very supportive people.

Maribel will invest the requested money in buying internet antennas to offer that service to her neighbors.

loans.use: to buy internet antennas.

loans.name: Mylyn

texts.en: Mylin is a 29-year-old married woman with two school-aged children. She has a business which retails mobile phones. Mylin has been in this business for seven years and earns a monthly income of PHP 13,000. She plans to use the entire loan she has requested to increase her inventory of mobile phone accessories such as cases and phone handles. With the profits, she will buy a plot of land. In the future, she wants to build her own store.

loans.use: to buy phone accessories like cases and phone handle for her business.

loans.name: Zarina

texts.ru: Зарина – 34 года, замужем, имеет 3 детей. Она женщина -предприниматель, которая имеет свой бизнес. У Зарины свой магазин, в котором она принимает на заказ мебель. Это занятие является основным доходом для семьи. Муж Зарины помогает ей в этом деле. Он изготавливает мебель в цеху с несколькими рабочими. Опыт в этой сфере деятельности более 4 лет. На полученный кредит она хочет закупить сырьё. Муж Зарины очень благодарен за финансовую поддержку, так как ему не надо уезжать на заработки в РФ и быть вместе с семьей.
texts.en: Zarina is 34 years old, married, and has 3 children. She is an entrepreneur and runs her own business. With her husband's help, Zarina operates a shop where she makes furniture to order. This business represents the main source of income for her family. Zarina manufactures the furniture in a workshop with several craftsmen. She has over 4 years of experience in this area. She would like to use this loan to purchase raw materials. Zarina's husband is very grateful for the financial support, as he will not have to go to Russia to find work and can stay with his family.

loans.use: to procure raw materials for furniture production

loans.name: Boldukan

texts.ru: Болдукан –участница группы Терек -3. Болдукан 33 года. В качестве  источника дохода для семьи, Болдукан занимается животноводством.  Имея в хозяйстве 1 дойную корову, 14 овец, 1 лошадь,  Болдукан имеет ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 4,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Болдукан обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов скота. Доходы Болдукан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего  хозяйства.
texts.en: Boldukan is a member of the Terek-3 group. She is 33 years old. As a source of income for her family, Boldukan raises livestock. With 1 dairy cow, 14 sheep, and 1 horse in her herd, Boldukan makes 4,000 som (KGS) per month. In order to continue developing her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) to purchase additional livestock. Boldukan plans to invest her profits into further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Elba

texts.es:
Elba tiene 40 años, es una mujer seria y con muchas aspiraciones. Vive en compañía de Joel, su esposo, desde hace 13 años. Ambos tienen una hija, Melina, a la que cuidan mucho, su casa es propia y está ubicada en el caserío de Usibamba. 

Las actividades que realiza son diversas. Por la mañana, desde muy temprano, abre las puertas de su casa, donde hace algún tiempo implementó una tienda de comestibles. Como mujer del campo, también se dedica a la ganadería, tiene 4 vacas y vende la leche que producen. Asimismo, siembra en sus terrenos agrícolas; avena, habas, alverja y papa. Cuenta que desde los 15 años comenzó a trabajar de manera independiente, pues tenía que ayudar a su familia, con el tiempo se hizo independiente. Por ello no descansa, al contrario, para el futuro desea aumentar sus ganancias con la compra de cerdos. Ya que piensa ensebarlos y venderlos a los carniceros de la zona. 

Ella pertenece al grupo “Usibamba” y éste es el tercer crédito que tiene con MFP. Promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, como en los anteriores préstamos que tubo.

Elba invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una vaca para aumentar su ganado, pues hace poco vendió uno de sus ejemplares.
texts.en:
Elba, 40, is a serious woman with many goals.  She lives with Joel, her husband of 13 years.  They have a daughter, Melina, whom they take care of a lot.  Her house is her own; it is located in the hamlet of Usibamba.

She does various jobs.  In the morning, very early, she opens the doors of her house, where some time ago she set up a grocery store.  As a country woman, she also raises livestock.  She has four cows and she sells the milk they produce.  She also grows crops on her croplands: oats, broad beans, peas, and potatoes.  

She says that since she was 15 she has worked independently because she had to help her family.  In time she became independent.  Because of this she does not rest; on the contrary, for the future she wants to increase her profits with the purchase of pigs.  She plans to fatten them up and sell them to the butchers in the area.

She belongs to the Usibamba group and this is her third loan with MFP.  She promises to be punctual in making her payments, as with the previous loans she had.

Elba will invest the requested money in buying a cow to increase her livestock, because she sold one a short time ago.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Suyumkan

texts.ru: Суйумкан – лидер группы Терек -4, объединяющей еще двух участников. Суйумкан 46 лет, вдова,  имеет 4 детей. В качестве  источника дохода для семьи, в 1995 году Суйумкан начала  заниматься животноводством.  Начатое со стартовой суммы в 3,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство  на сегодня приносит около 8,000 сом (KGS) в месяц с продажи молока и молочных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Суйумкан обратился в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов скота. Доходы Суйумкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего  хозяйства.
texts.en: Suyumkan is the leader of the Terek-4 group, which contains two other members. Suyumkan is 46 years old, widowed, and has 4 children. To provide for her family, Suyumkan began raising livestock in 1995. Her business, launched with an initial sum of 3,000 som (KGS), presently earns roughly 8,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk and dairy products. In order to continue developing her business, Suyumkan has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) to purchase additional livestock. She plans to invest her profits into further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is a 25-year-old lady from Migori. She is married to Joseph with whom she has two kids, age 2 and 6 years.
Caroline operates a charcoal-selling business, a business she has been doing for the last three years. She makes a monthly income of 4,800 KES. 
She is taking her first loan from KADET LTD which she will use to buy more charcoal sacks for re-sale. Her profits will be used to pay the loan.
Her dream is to put her kids through college.

loans.use: To buy more sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is 33 years old, married, and blessed with three children, aged nine, six and four years, respectively.  He is a photographer (both still and video), a business he started seven years ago. He earns a monthly income of KES 18,000. He has requested his first loan with KADET for KES 15,000 to purchase a still camera. The profit he earns will help him buy an editing suite for his photographs. His dream is to produce quality videos and movies as well as own a printing company some day.

loans.use: To purchase a still camera.

loans.name: Violet

texts.en:
Violet is a 38-year-old lady from Vihiga. She is married to a man named Eugene and they have two children between 10 and 18 years old. 

Violet sells maize cereal, a business she has been doing for the last four years. She makes a monthly income of KES 10,000. She is now taking her first loan from KADET LTD which she will use to buy more stock of maize cereal. Her profits will be used to repay the loan. Her dream is to expand her business and educate her kids.

loans.use: To buy more stock of maize cereal.

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita started sewing and weaving to generate income to support her home. When she saw the need in the market, she opened a general store where she offers all types of products for basic family needs. In her store, Rosita is known for offering very good products and offering very good service. This has allowed her to have a lot of customers and guarantee good sales. She has the difficulty of having to take care of her father. He is very ill and elderly. This prevents her from keeping her business open as much as she would like to for her customers. Despite this, her business' good reputation has made her customers continue to buy from her and helped her business grow little by little over time. Due to the fact that her business doesn't have enough products, Rosita is seeking a loan of PHP 7,000 to purchase sacks of rice, oil, snack food, and canned goods to offer the community.

Rosita hopes that this will make her business grow even more and help her improve her and her family's quality of life. She dreams of having a big business that will guarantee good income and thus avoid the financial difficulties she has encountered, and she hopes to keep progressing in life.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of rice, oil, snack food, and canned goods for her store.

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en:
Eunice is a 23-year-old lady from Kisumu. She is married to Gabriel with whom she has three children aged five years, two years, and four months.

Eunice operates a business selling cooking oil and has been doing this for the last 3 years. She makes a monthly income of KES 10,000. She is taking her first loan from KADET LTD which she will use to buy more stock of cooking oil. Her profits will be used to repay the loan. Her dream is to expand her cooking oil business.

loans.use: To buy more stock of cooking oil.

loans.name: Victoria Bahati

texts.en: Victoria has been selling assorted fruits and vegetables to her customers for the past 10 years with great success. She paid her previous loan fully and on time. This is her second loan from KADET LTD. She plans to purchase more mangoes,bananas, pineapple, kale, cabbages, and oranges to re-sell to her customers. She will use the anticipated profits to educate her children and repay her loan. She hopes to excel in the business.

loans.use: to purchase more mangoes, bananas, pineapples, kale, cabbages, and oranges.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy meat, eggs and vegetables to cook and sell.

loans.name: Marry

texts.en: Marry is 45 years old. She has four children and is already widowed. She carries the burden alone in providing the needs of her children. To generate an income, she cooks and sells food for daily meals and snacks. She has been doing it for over 10 years. She earns about P4,000 each month. It goes for allowances and meals. She is now asking for a loan of P6,000 to buy pork meat and more vegetables and rice to cook and sell. This will help increase her earnings. In the future, she would like to keep improving her food selling business so that she can achieve a progressive life for her family.

loans.use: to buy pork meat and more vegetables and rice to cook and sell.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is married with four children between 9 and 20. All of them are enrolled in school. His wife works as a farmer. He has been a rice farmer for 20 years. He would like to get this loan to buy seeds and support labor costs to get the best harvest. With the profits, he plans to expand the area he has been using to get more output.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain under-served by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To pay for seeds and labor costs.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is still farming in Ndunyu Njeru town. He used his previous loan amount to pay school fees for his children and he was able to pay his loan amount back in good time.

He is now running a quarry business where he makes and sells building blocks and stones to various construction sites both in and out of town. He plans to use this fifth loan, for 20,000 Kenyan shillings (KES), to boost his quarry business by buying more quarrying equipment and employing more workers as well.

In the future, Charles hopes to grow his business and make more income to improve the standard of living of his family.

loans.use: To boost his quarrying business.

loans.name: Muyheang's Group

texts.en: Muyheang, a 39-year-old mother of three, lives in Kandal province. She leads a group of two members. All of her children are in school. For the last 18 years, Muyheang has supported the family by growing ginger and garlic. From selling these crops, she can save less than two US dollars per day.  Muyheang has been with VisionFund since 2006. This is her sixth loan with VisionFund. Muyheang requested the loan to buy ginger and garlic seeds and also fertilizers. She hopes the loan will help to increase her crop yields and therefore earn her more income to expand her business, increase her savings, and help to keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy ginger and garlic seeds and also fertilizers.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en: George is 39 years old, from Naivasha, and is married to Minnie. They have four children who are all in school. George is a farmer and has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD to enable him to buy farm supplies. He is optimistic that his business will do well after the loan. He hopes to start zero grazing units on his farm in the near future.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is married with five children who are between 2 and 8 years old. Two of them attend school. His wife works as a farmer. He has been a rice farmer for 5 years. He would like to get this loan to buy seeds and support labor costs to get the best harvest. With the profits, he plans to expand the area he has been using to get more output.


The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To pay for labor costs and seeds for his rice production.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To add to her stock of vegetables, onions, kale and tomatoes.

loans.name: Sanaa

texts.en:
Sanaa is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Farid appears in her Kiva profile photo.

Sanaa is a 25-year-old young woman. She is married to Farid with no children yet. Her husband is employed in addition to his work in agriculture, but in both he gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover all their needs.

Sanaa is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing new home furniture, such as living room and dining room furniture. Taking this loan will offer suitable home furniture to Sanaa and her husband and will help to positively improve their living conditions.

loans.use: To complete purchasing new home furniture.

loans.name: Maureen

texts.en: Maureen is a forty-six-year-old single mother of four children living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been selling clothes for ten years, and this has enabled her to sustainably support her family by herself. She is our very loyal customer, and she attributes her success to the credit facilities offered to her over time. Her hardships are price fluctuation and inflation. Her personal goal is educating her children, and her business dream is setting up a boutique in town. Maureen intends to use the loan facility to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Vasta

texts.en:
Vasta is a fifty-four-year-old married woman with seven children, living in Kasese, Uganda.She has been in the bar business for twenty months, and within this period she has been able to attract very many loyal customers. Her hardships are limited space and seating and also inadequate capital to purchase drinks since the demand is very high. 

Her personal goal is educating her children and her business goal is expanding her business into new markets. Vasta wants money to buy beer and chairs for her bar.

loans.use: to buy beer and chairs for her bar.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is a 30-year-old lady from Kisumu. She is married to Michael and they have four children, aged ten, seven, six and two years.

Caroline operates an open air retail business selling items like milk, eggs and detergents - a business she has been doing for the last 3 years, making a monthly income of about Kes 12,000. She is taking her first loan from KADET LTD which she will use to buy more stock of milk and eggs. She will use her profits to pay school fees.

Her dream is to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy a stock of milk and eggs.

loans.name: Lucía

texts.es:
Lucía tiene 40 años, vive con sus 3 hijos, en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Saño.

Desde hace 13 años se dedica a la elaboración de ladrillos en su mini fábrica, para lo cual arrienda terrenos de suelo arcilloso, que es la materia prima fundamental en la elaboración de sus ladrillos. Con ayuda de sus hermanos reparte a los clientes que le solicitan, de acuerdo a la producción. También contrata la mano de obra de varios obreros que le ayudan a fabricar los ladrillos en cantidades grandes, contados por millares. En todos estos años de trabajo ha visto el progreso de su negocio, lo que le ha permitido sostener a sus hijos, por tal motivo desea continuar con este trabajo. 

Este es su crédito número 22 con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, ya que conocen que es responsable en sus pagos. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas que conoce, responsables y muy solidarias.

El dinero que solicita Lucía lo invertirá en el pago del arrendamiento de una nueva área de terreno que posee una buena capa de suelo arcilloso y también en la compra de aserrín.
texts.en:
Lucía is 40 years old and lives with her three children in her own house, which is located in the town of San Pedro de Saño.

She has worked making bricks in her mini-factory for 13 years. In order to do so, she rents pieces of land that have clay soil, which is the main raw material needed to make her bricks. With her siblings' help, she delivers to the customers who order from her, according to production. She also hires several workers, whose manpower helps her make large quantities of bricks, counted by the thousands. Over all these years of work, she has seen her business develop. It has allowed her to support her children, and that is why she wants to continue in this line of work. 

This is her 22nd loan with MFP. She is very happy to know she has financial support, since they know she is responsible with her payments. She also enjoys belonging to her communal bank because she knows all the members and they are all responsible and very supportive people.

Lucía will invest the money she is requesting in paying rent for a new piece of land, which has a good layer of clay soil, and also in purchasing sawdust.

loans.use: to rent a piece of land to make bricks.

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es:
Yanet tiene 27 años, es una mujer trabajadora y vive en compañía de William, su esposo, desde hace 10 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos; Estefanía, Josué y Jean Carlo. Su casa es propia y está ubicada en la localidad de Usibamba.  

El trabajo continuo es su lema. Todas las mañanas, desde muy temprano, prepara los alimentos que venderá en la escuela de su localidad. Hace 2 años abrió un pequeño negocio, en el cual vende golosinas, bebidas y comida casera a los alumnos y profesores que cada refrigerio visitan su puesto. Cuenta que le fue difícil obtener el permiso para vender dentro de la institución, “pero nada es difícil si eres constante”, afirma. Al mismo tiempo, y como mujer del campo, también se dedica a la siembra de avena en terrenos de su comunidad. Todos los fines de semana cuida y fertiliza los campos para que le den una buena cosecha, la que después venderá en la feria de los días viernes en la ciudad. Yanet desea trabajar con más ahínco para mejorar sus ingresos económicos, para ello comenzó a preparar yogurt con la leche que producen sus vacas.

Ella pertenece al grupo “Usibamba” y éste es el cuarto crédito que tiene con MFP. Promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas.  

Yanet invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de golosinas para su negocio, además de semilla de avena para comenzar su próxima siembra.
texts.en:
Yanet is 27 years old and is a working woman who has lived with her husband, William, for 10 years. They have three children: Estefanía, Josué y Jean Carlo. They have their own home that is located in the neighborhood of Usibamba.

Her motto is: always work. Every morning, very early, she prepares her children's food to take with them to school. And two years ago she opened her own little business where she sells candies, drinks and home made food to students and teachers who visit her stand for refreshments. She says that it was difficult to obtain permission to sell her items inside the school, "but nothing is impossible if you are consistent," she says. At the same time, being someone from the countryside, she also cultivates oats on land in her community. Every weekend she fertilizes and takes care of her fields so she has a good harvest, which she will sell in the city markets on Fridays. Yanet wants to work more determinedly to improve her profits and to do so she is starting to make yogurt with milk from cows.

She belongs to the group "Usibamba," and this will be her fourth credit that she has with MFP. She promises to be punctual and pay her installments.

Yanet will invest her money in the purchase of candies for her business as well as seeds to start her next sowing.

loans.use: purchase candies and seeds.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is a forty-one-year-old married man who lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is charged with the responsibility of looking after the family. He trades in cattle. He buys at a relatively low price from farmers in the countryside and then transports these cattle to town and sells at a very good profitable price.

He has personal goals of educating his children and building a permanent house. He faces hardships of price fluctuations, high fuel and transportation costs and inadequate capital to purchase enough stock. However, he has a vision of expanding his business to new markets and buying his own lorry. John needs money to buy cattle for resale.

loans.use: to buy cattle for resale.

loans.name: Carmen Lourdes

texts.es: Carmen   de 23  años vive (Quevedo   Guayaquil). El decidió entrar a este negocio porque es una buena manera de tener dinero para poder darles lo necesario a sus hijos. Este negocio  es el de tener un restaurante aparte vende comida rápida. Le gusta y le va bien gracias a Dios. Trabaja todos los días con la ayuda de su suegra  es casada su esposo es chofer. La dificultad que tiene es la delincuencia. a futuro anhela tener su negocio grande y tener a su familia unida . Con el préstamo comprara (congelador, colas )
texts.en:
Carmen is 23 years old and lives in Quevedo, Guayaquil. She decided to get into this business because it is a good way to earn money in order to give her children what they need. She has a restaurant and also sells fast food. She enjoys this work, and it is going well thanks to God.

	She works every day with the help of her mother in-law; she is married and her husband is a driver. One difficulty that she faces is crime. In the future, she hopes to have a larger business and to have her entire family together. With this loan, she will buy a freezer and drinks.

loans.use: to purchase a freezer and drinks

loans.name: Mirian Alexandra

texts.es: Mirian  de 37   años vive (Quevedo   Guayaquil). Decidio entrar a este negocio porque es una buena manera de tener dinero para poder darles lo necesario a sus hijos. El negocio del bazar lo empezo gracias a su hija quien le dio el capital que necesitaba, atualmente le gusta y le va bien gracias a Dios. Trabaja todos los días sola ya que es soltera. La dificultad que tiene es la delincuencia  . a futuro anhela tener su negocio grande y tener a su familia unida . Con el préstamo comprara (cuadernos, papeleria)
texts.en: Mirian is 37 years old and she lives in Quevedo. She has decided to open a bazaar because this is a good way to earn the money she needs to provide for her children and to pay for their necessities. She has succeeded in opening her shop thanks to her daughter, who gave her the money she needed to start her activity; she was successful and she likes it, and she thanks God because things are going well. She is single and she works alone every day; crime in the area is the challenge she has to face. In the future she hopes to own a big shop and to keep her family together. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy notebooks and stationery.

loans.use: To buy notebooks and stationery.

loans.name: Lissett Katherine

texts.es: Lissett de 22 años, es una mujer trabajadora que vende mercadería como ropa, perfumes, etc. Comenzó a trabajar  con poca mercadería ya que no tenía mucho capital. Poco a poco continuo con sus ventas desde las 09:00am hasta las 14:00, continua trabajando. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere comprar con el prestamo más mercadería como cosméticos, cremas, perfumes etc.
texts.en: Lissett is 22 years old. She is a hardworking woman who sells products such as clothes and perfumes. She started working with a few products as she did not have much money; then, little by little she has kept on selling, working form 9 am to 2 pm. She has many ambitions for her shop, and for this reason she has requested a loan to buy more products such as cosmetics, creams and perfumes.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics, creams and perfumes.

loans.name: Gladys Ruby

texts.es:
Gladys  es una mujer que tiene 34 años de edad, de estado civil  conviviente, con dos hijos a su cargo, vive en casa propia con sus hijos y su cónyuge. Se menciona que  La calidad de vida en la comunidad es de subsistencia, la mayoría de moradores  son trabajadores independientes  que se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y crianza de animales menores y algunos de ellos adicionalmente dedicados al comercio. Gladys vive en casa propia en el caserío La Matanza del distrito de Morropón del  departamento de Piura; así mismo cuentan con el servicio  básico de energía eléctrica, agua y desagüe; también se menciona que en este caserío viven aproximadamente unas 500 familias bajo estas condiciones.
La actividad comercial a la que se dedica Gladys es la  venta de harina de jora, este pequeño negocio la tiene instalada en su propio domicilio, donde atiende a sus clientes ya Fidelizados; así mismo también se dedica a la crianza de aves de corral  y cuenta con 3 años de experiencia, lo que le ha permitido mantener su clientela ya establecida en ambos negocios. Su cónyuge lo apoya arduamente en sus actividades que realiza, existiendo una buena relación familiar entre ellos. 
Actualmente Gladys se ha propuesto ampliar su inventario en lo referente a su establecimiento comercial (pequeño negocio), esto debido a que es una actividad muy rentable en la zona; es por estas circunstancias  que esta solicitando un nuevo préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de S/. 1000 nuevos soles el cual estará destinado a la inversión de compra de insumos (maíz amarillo duro, sacos y medidores),  y así mismo realizar mejoras en su local; lo cual en el tiempo le va permitir ir mejorando su nivel de vida con su familia.
texts.en:
Gladys is a 34 year old woman who lives with her common law husband and who has two children in her care.  She lives in her own house with her children and her husband.  She mentions that the quality of life in her community is one of subsistence.  The majority of people are independent workers that work in agriculture, livestock, and raising small animals, and some of them are also dedicated to business.  Gladys lives in her own home in the neighborhood La Matanza of the district of Morropón in the state of Piura;  the area counts on basic electrical service, water and sewage.  She also mentions that in this neighborhood there are approximately 500 families in those conditions.  

Gladys's business activity is the sale of "harina de jora" or a type of flour made from dried fermented corn that is used for traditional drinks.  This small business is installed in her own home, where she serves her faithful clients.  She also is dedicated to the raising of caged birds and has three years of experience, which has permitted her to maintain an established clientele in both businesses.  Her husband supports her passionately in the work that she accomplishes, since they have a good family relationship between them.
  
Currently Gladys has proposed increasing her inventory in reference to her small business, since it is a very profitable activity in the zone  For that reason she is asking for a new loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1000 Nuevos Soles (Peruvian currency), which will be invested in the purchase of food products (yellow dry corn, bags and measurers).  In this way she will improve her store, which in the long run will permit her to improve the quality of life of her family.

loans.use: To purchase food products and to make improvements to her business.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Anita como la llaman sus vecinos de cariño, vive en Portoviejo-Manabí pero nació en Charapoto. Charapoto es un recinto donde sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería. Es un pueblo pequeño en donde se tiene muy pocos probabilidades de crecer. Cuando se casó con Jorge decidieron vivir en Portoviejo capital de Manabí. Anita tiene 3 hijos que asisten a la escuela, colegio fiscal. Empezó vendiendo por una amiga quien le dijo que le vendría bien un dinero extra, como su esposo es vendedor de mariscos no siempre le iba bien. El trabajo lo realiza sola de mañana mostrando la revista o productos que tenga a sus familiares, vecinos y amigos. No comenta que le gusta porque le permite cuidar a sus hijos al no tener un horario fijo. Le preguntamos ¿Cuál es el riesgo que tiene su negocio? Y nos comento: Darle el producto a una persona que no le cancele a tiempo o no le pague. Con el préstamo Anita comprara mercadería como: cremas, perfumes, shampo etc. Su sueño futuro es arreglar su casa para mejorar su estilo de vida.
texts.en:
Anita, like she’s affectionately referred to by her neighbors, lives in Portoviejo-Manabí but was born in Charapoto.  Charapoto is a district whose inhabitants farm and raise livestock.  It’s a small town with very few growth opportunities.  When she married Jorge they decided to live in Portoviejo, capital of Manabí. Anita has three children attending public elementary and secondary school; the last one is not yet in her care.  

She started selling thanks to a girlfriend who told her some extra money would do her good since her seafood selling husband didn’t always do too well.  She works alone during the morning showing catalogues or products to her relatives, neighbors and friends.  

She comments that she likes it because it allows her to care for her children by not having a fixed work schedule.  We asked her:  “What risks does your business have?” and she commented: “Delivering products to someone who doesn’t pay on time or pay at all.”  Anita will use the loan to buy merchandise like creams, perfume, shampoo, etc.  Her future dream is to improve her home for a better lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy creams, perfume and shampoo.

loans.name: Percy

texts.es:
Percy es un hombre de 41 años de edad, soltero y sin hijos. Vive en casa de sus padres, quienes tienen parcela agrícola. La casa está ubicada en el Caserío Monteverde Bajo del Distrito de Tambogrande. El Cliente vive en la parte rural  de este distrito, pero cuentan con servicio de luz.
La actividad que desarrolla Percy es la ganadería y agricultura; el ganado al alcanzar peso y tamaño ideal lo comercializa en el mercado local. Sus padres tienen parcela agrícola en donde siembran mango y limón en producción, el cliente es quién ha sembrado las plantas de limón años atrás bajo el permiso de sus padres y cuya producción es para él. 
El monto del crédito solicitado es de S/.500 nuevos soles, dicho  crédito será para la compra de alimento balanceado para su ganado. , y con esto logrará atender la demanda insatisfecha en el lugar,  y poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Percy is a 41 year old single man with no children.  He lives in his parents’ house; they own a parcel of farmland.  The house is located in Monteverde Bajo settlement, Tambogrande District.  He lives in the rural part of this district but does have electricity.

The activity Percy carries out is raising cattle and farming.  When the cattle reaches ideal size and weight it’s sold in the local market.  His parents have a parcel of farmland where they grow mangoes and lemons.  Percy planted the lemon trees years ago with his parents’ permission and what he produces is for him.

The amount of the requested loan is 500 new soles that will be used to buy feed for his cattle in order to respond to unmet customer need in the place and to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Jose Roberto

texts.es:
José es un hombre  de 69 años de edad, casado y sin hijos a su cargo. Vive en casa propia con su esposa. La casa está ubicada en el Caserío Santa Rosa del Distrito de Tambogrande del departamento de Piura. Cliente vive en la parte rural  de este distrito, pero cuenta con servicio de luz.
La actividad que desarrolla José  es la ganadería y agricultura; el ganado al alcanzar tamaño y peso exacto los comercializa en el mercado local. Tiene 0.50 has de terreno agrícola, las cuales están sembrada con limón y se encuentra en producción. Su esposa se dedica a la crianza de aves de corral.
El  monto solicitado  del crédito será de S/. 2000 nuevos soles y serà para la compra de alimento balanceado y también para la fertilización de su cultivo de limón. Gozan de muy buenas referencias.
texts.en:
José is a 69 year old man, married without dependent children. He lives in his own house with his wife. The house is located in the village of Santa Rosa de Curvan in the district of Tambogrande. He lives in a rural part of the district, but he has electricity. 

The activity that José works in is farming and agriculture; selling the cattle when they reach the proper size and weight in the local market. He has 0.50 hectares of agricultural land which are planted with lemons and are in cultivation. His wife works raising poultry.

The money from the loan will be used to buy animal feed and also for fertilizer for the cultivation of the lemons. He has many good references.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and fertilizer for his crops

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es:
Emilio es un hombre de  34 años de  edad de estado civil conviviente, tiene 3 hijos menores. vive con sus hijos y su cónyuge. La calidad de vida en la comunidad es de subsistencia la mayoría son trabajadores independientes en negocios de comercio y crianza de animales adicionalmente dedicados a la agricultura; actualmente  radica en el  caserío Arbolsol Alto  del distrito de  Morrope, es una zona rural a 30 minutos de Lambayeque.
La actividad comercial a la que se dedica Emilio es la crianza de  animales  menores y cuanta también con una mototaxi, además cuenta con  8 años de experiencia en dicha actividad., el  negocios esta ubicado en su propio domicilio.
El monto solicitado del crédito es de S/. 1500 nuevos soles y será invertido en  la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales (porcinos, cabritos) y mejoras en el corral de los mismos. Para eso cliente cuenta con los conocimientos para la adecuada alimentación de los animales.
texts.en:
Emilio is a 34-year-old man who lives with his partner.  He has three minor children.  He lives with his children and his spouse.  The quality of life in the community is subsistence.  The majority are independent workers in businesses and raising animals.  Additionally they work in agriculture.  Currently he lives in Caserío Arbolsol Alto S/N in the Mórrope district, a rural area 30 minutes from Lambayeque.

The business Emilio works in is raising small animals.  He also has a motorcycle taxi, with eight years of experience.  The business is located in his own home.

The amount of the requested loan is 1500 nuevos soles (PEN), and it will be invested in buying balanced feed to fatten his animals (pigs and goats) and improving the corral.  For this he has the right knowledge for feeding the animals.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed to fatten the animals.

loans.name: Marìa Manuela

texts.es:
María  es una mujer de  30 años de  edad de estado civil casada, tiene  3 hijos menores de edad; vive con sus hijos y  su cónyuge  la calidad de vida en la comunidad es de subsistencia la mayoría son trabajadores independientes en negocios de comercio y crianza de animales adicionalmente dedicados a la agricultura, su domicilio se encuentra en el caserío Santa Isabel del distrito de Morrope es una zona rural a 35  minutos de Lambayeque.
La actividad comercial  a la que se dedica María es la  crianza y comercio  de  animales, cuenta con 10 años de experiencia  en dicha actividad, el negocio se encuentra ubicado en su propio domicilio  cuenta con clientela fija.
El monto solicitado del crédito es de S/.4000 nuevos soles y será invertido en  la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales (porcinos, cabritos, aves de corral) y mejoras en el corral de los mismos. Para eso cliente cuenta con los conocimientos para la adecuada alimentación de los animales.
texts.en:
Maria, 30, is married and lives with her husband and 3 young children. The typical lifestyle in their community is one of subsistence - most of the people are self-employed in animal husbandry and farming. Her house is an an annex of Santa Clara, in the district of Morrope, a rural area 35 minutes outside of Lambayeque.

Maria raises and sells animals. She has 10 years of experience in this line of work. Her business is in her own home and she has a fixed clientele.

The 4000 nuevos soles requested will be invested in the purchase of balanced feed to fatten her animals (pigs, goats, chickens) and make improvements to the corral. She has knowledge of the proper feeding of her animals.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed to fatten her animals.

loans.name: Mirtha Soledad

texts.es:
Mirtha es una mujer  casada, vive con su cónyuge en el Caserío Lagunas, Provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,  y es muy  conocida en el medio, por su labor de venta y crianza de animales.  Vive con su hijos (15 y 06 años), quien le apoyan en las labor del negocio.
La actividad comercial a la que se dedica María es la  venta de abarrotes, su bodega esta ubicada en su propio  domicilio. 
El monto solicitado del crédito es de S/.2000 nuevos soles, con el crédito comprará màs mercadería para surtir su negocio, de esta manera atendiendo la demanda insatisfecha en el lugar,  ampliará su cartera de clientes, contando con clientes nuevos e ingresos adicionales a la familia.
texts.en:
Mirtha is a married woman who lives with her husband in the village of Lagunas, province of Chiclayo in the department of Lambayeque.  She is well-known for her work of selling and raising animals.  Mirtha lives with her children (ages 15 and 6) who help her with the duties of her business.  

Mirtha sells groceries and has a store located in her home.  The amount of 2,000 PEN that she is requesting will be used to buy more merchandise to restock her business.  She will be able to address the unmet demand in this place.  Her clientele is growing since she has new customers and additional income for her family.

loans.use: to buy grocery products for her store.

loans.name: Enh-Amgalan

texts.en: Enh-Amgalan is a 42-year-old widowed woman who lives with her daughter in Ulaanbaatar City, Mongolia. Her daughter goes to secondary school. They live in a rental 'ger.' Since her husband died, she started a boots production and retail business in 2008. She is a talented woman in the field and makes boots in a stylish and traditional way. Not only does she make boots, but she has started to rent a shop counter to sell them. Enh-Amgalan is a hard-working woman who says, "I would like to develop my business activities by purchasing the necessary materials for the boots' production. I am planning to improve my livelihood level." The total amount she is requesting is 3,000,000 MNT to buy more materials.

loans.use: To buy more materials

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is twenty-seven years old and married with two children.  He has a public address system.  He has been in the business for six years now and gets a monthly income of ten thousand shillings.

This will be his second loan from KADET LTD. He plans to use the entire loan to purchase entertainment machines. With the profit, he wants to expand his business. In the future, he wants to be a competent business person.

loans.use: To purchase entertainment machines

loans.name: Nexar

texts.es:
Nexar es una hombre de 27 años de edad, conviviente y con 02 hijos. Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en  el  Caserío San Pablo Distrito de Tambogrande. Nexar vive en la parte rural  de este distrito. Y solo cuenta con servicio básico de energía eléctrica.
La actividad que desarrolla Nexar es la crianza de ganado menor y aves de corral los cuales los cría y engorda en la parte posterior de su domicilio, además cuenta con 1,0 has de terreno agrícola que su padre le ha dado como herencia donde tiene sembrado limón que cosecha semanalmente.
El  monto solicitado del crédito es de 1500 nuevos soles y  será para la compra de fertilizantes para  su cultivo de limón y realizar mejoras en su corral de sus animales., lo cual le permitirá seguir creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
Nexar is 27 years old, lives with his partner, and has 2 children. He lives in her own house, which is located in the small town of San Pablo, in the district of Tambogrande. Nexar lives in a rural part of this district. The only basic service he has is electricity.

Nexar raises small livestock and domestic fowl, which he raises and fattens in his back yard. He also has 1 hectare of agricultural land, which his father left him as an inheritance, and which is planted with limes that he harvests weekly. 

The requested amount of the loan is 1,500 nuevos soles (PEN) and it will be for buying fertilizers for his limes and to make improvements to his livestock corral. This will allow him to continue growing in his business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his limes and to improve his livestock corral.

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer de 58 años de edad, casada y con 01 hijo a su cargo. Vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, la casa está ubicada en el caserío Cruce de Vega del Distrito de Tambogrande del departamento de Piura. Cliente vive en la parte  rural del distrito, pero cuenta con servicio de luz.
La actividad que desarrolla la Luz es la venta de cerveza, gaseosas y cosméticos, atendiendo en propio domicilio y cuenta con clientela ya establecida en la zona. Su esposo es trabajador estable en un fundo agrícola del caserío Cruceta y llega al hogar los fines de semana.
 El  monto solicitado del crédito es de 2000 nuevos soles y  será para la compra de mercadería y poder surtir su negocio, lo cual le permitirá seguir creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
Luz, 58, is married and has one son in her care. They live in the home that they own in the village Cruce de Vega in the district of Tambogrande. It's in a rural part of the district, but has electricity.

Luz sells beer, sodas and cosmetics from her home. She has an established customer base in the area. Her husband has a stable job on a farm in the village of Cruceta and comes home on the weekends.

The requested 2000 nuevos soles will be used to purchase merchandise so that she can stock her store, which will allow her to keep growing her business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.es:
Rosalía es una mujer  de 28 años de edad, conviviente y con 01 hijo a su cargo. Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en  el  Caserío Atahualpa del distrito de Tambogrande departamento de Piura, cliente vive en parte rural, solo cuenta con energía eléctrica.
La actividad que desarrolla Rosalía es la crianza de animales menores como ovinos y aves de corral  en una parte de su domicilio, tiene mas de 3 años en esta actividad, su conviviente lo apoya en sus actividades.
El monto solicitado del préstamo es de 1000 nuevos soles y será para compra de ganado y realizar mejoras en su corral. Rosalía  ha ido creciendo poco a poco con la ayuda de los créditos otorgados por nuestra entidad
texts.en:
Rosalía is a 28 years old, she lives with her partner and has 1 child. She lives in her own house, located in the hamlet of Atahualpa, Tambogrande. She lives in the rural area, and her house is equipped with electricity only.
Rosalía is a livestock farmer, breeding small animals such as sheep and poultry in an area of her house. She has been engaged in this activity for more than 3 years, and her partner supports her with her activities.
She is requesting a loan of 1000 PEN to buy livestock and to make improvements to her pen. Rosalía has made her activity grow little by little thanks to the loan she has received from our institution.

loans.use: To buy livestock and to make improvements to her pen.

loans.name: Leonor Isabel

texts.es:
Leonor es una mujer de 51  años de edad, de estado civil casada, vive en casa propia con un hijo a su cargo de 5 años, ella vive en la zona urbana marginal del distrito de Lambayeque, además cuenta con los servicios de agua y luz con un aproximado de 500  familias
La actividad que desarrolla Leonor  es la comercialización de abarrotes desde  hace 4 años, y el negocio lo tiene en el interior de su domicilio.
El monto del crédito solicitado es de 3000 nuevos soles y será para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de abarrotes y arreglos en su interior de su domicilió, cuenta con experiencia y clientela fidelizada. Así mismo su cónyuge trabaja como técnico en mantenimiento de maquinaria pesada, y apoya con la canasta familiar.
texts.en:
Leonor is a 51-year-old woman.  She is married and lives in her own home together with her 5-year-old, dependent son.  She lives in a poor urban area of Lambayeque district which has piped water and electricity.  There are approximately 500 families in this area.

Leonor's business is selling groceries.  She has been in this business for four years and it is located inside her home.  She is requesting a loan for 3,000 soles to invest in buying a larger quantity of groceries and to make some repairs to the inside of her home.  She has experience in her business and a loyal customer base.  Her husband works as a technician, maintaining heavy machinery.  He helps her with their basic family expenses.

loans.use: to buy groceries for her business and to make some repairs to the inside of her home

loans.name: Laureana

texts.es:
Laureana es una mujer  separada, con hijos disipados, bastante  conocida en el medio, por su labor en la venta de productos de  abarrotes y verduras; vive junto a su hija,  vive en el distrito de Zaña, provincia de Chiclayo del Departamento de Lambayeque.
Laureana se dedica a la venta de productos de abarrotes al por menor  desde hace más de 15 años en Zaña.  El monto solicitado del crédito es de 3000 nuevos soles y lo invertirá en la compra de productos de abarrotes para surtir el negocio, logrará atender la demanda insatisfecha en el lugar y  ampliará su cartera de clientes,
texts.en:
Laureana is a woman who is separated from her spouse.  Her children are scattered in various places.  Laureana is known for her work of selling groceries and vegetables.  She lives with her daughter in the District of Zaña, which is a 45-minute drive from Chiclayo.  

Laureana has been a grocery retailer in Zaña for more than 15 years.  The loan amount of 3,000 PEN that she requested will be invested in the purchase of grocery products to restock her business.  This will enable her to satisfy the unmet demand in this place and expand her customer base.

loans.use: to buy grocery products for her store.

loans.name: Tarijeño

texts.es:
El señor, Tarijeño percibe ingresos trabajando muchas horas elaborando ladrillos para las construcciones. Tarijeño es casado y tiene un hijo  a  quien debe alimentar y vestir, su esposa le ayuda en los gastos familiares ya que percibe ingresos trabajando como cocinera en una pensión pero tampoco gana mucho y no cuentan con seguro medico.
Tarijeño, solo tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar hasta la primaria, pero pudo comprarse un pequeño terreno, es por eso que solicita el crédito para comprar piedra, ladrillo, cemento y otros materiales para poder construir tres habitaciones en planta baja para darles mas seguridad y comodidad a su familia.
El sueño que tiene Tarijeño, es mejorar su calidad de vida y sus ingresos para poder pagar los estudios de su hijo. La familia vive en la zona de Llojeta de la ciudad de La Paz
Es la segunda vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la primera vez junto a KIVA.
Por lo general, los clientes de Impro viven en zonas peri urbana de la ciudad de La Paz y El Alto. Las casas donde habitan están compuestas de dos o tres habitaciones sin terminar, a veces sin baño y con pisos de tierra o cemento. Los préstamos que solicitan son para efectuar mejoras en sus viviendas, para poder ofrecer mayor comodidad a sus familiares.
texts.en:
Tarijeño earns income working many hours manufacturing bricks for construction.  Tarijeño is married and has a son he must feed and clothe.  His wife helps him with household expenses since she earns income working as a cook in a boarding house but she doesn’t earn very much and they don’t have health insurance.

Tarijeño was only able to study up to elementary school but was able to buy himself a small plot of land and that’s why he’s asking for the loan to buy stone, bricks, cement and other materials to build three rooms on the ground floor to provide his family with more security and comfort.

Tarijeño’s dream is to improve his quality of life and his income to pay for his son’s schooling. The family lives in the city of La Paz’s Llojeta zone.  It’s the second time he’s worked with IMPRO and first with KIVA.

In general, Impro clients live in the peri-urban zones of the cities of La Paz and El Alto.  The houses they live in have two or three unfinished rooms, sometimes with no bathroom and dirt or cement floors.  The loans they request are to do home improvements to offer more comfort to their families.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan, es casado y tiene seis hijos con los cuales vive en tres habitaciones de adobe y es por eso que solicita el crédito para comprar ladrillo, arena, cemento,por que quiere construir una habitación mas para que su familia tenga más comodidad ya que son muchos miembros.
Juan, estudio solo hasta la primaria y actualmente trabaja como chofer y no tiene muchos ingresos a pesar de trabajar muchas horas y bajo muchos riesgos de ser asaltado o atracado por las noches. Pero es el unico ingreso que tiene para mantener a su familia ya que solo él cubre todos los gastos familiares por que tampoco cuenta con  un seguro médico.
El sueño de Juan es mejorar sus ingresos para poder cubrir los gastos de estudios para sus hijos ya que algunos ya están en la universidad.
Es la primera vez que trabaja con IMPRO y KIVA.
Por lo general, los clientes de Impro viven en zonas peri urbana de la ciudad de La Paz y El Alto. Las casas donde habitan están compuestas de dos o tres habitaciones sin terminar, a veces sin baño y con pisos de tierra o cemento. Los préstamos que solicitan son para efectuar mejoras en sus viviendas, para poder ofrecer mayor comodidad a sus familiares.
texts.en:
Juan is married and has six children he lives with in three adobe rooms and this is why he’s asking for a loan to buy bricks, sand and cement because he wants to build an additional room so that his family can have more comfort because the family is numerous.

Juan only studied elementary school and currently works as a driver but his income is low despite working many hours at risk of being assaulted or robbed at night.  But it’s the only income he has to support his family since he alone covers all family expenses; he also does not have medical insurance.

Juan’s dream is to improve his income to cover all his children’s schooling expenses because some are already in university.  This is the first time he’s worked with IMPRO and with KIVA.

In general, Impro clients live in the peri-urban zones of the cities of La Paz and El Alto.  The houses they live in have two or three unfinished rooms, sometimes with no bathroom and dirt or cement floors.  The loans they request are to do home improvements to offer more comfort to their families.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es:
José es un hombre de 41 años de edad, casado, con dos hijos a su cargo. Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en el Caserío Pedregal Alto del Distrito de Tambogrande del departamento de Piura. José  vive en la  zona rural del caserío. Y no  cuenta con servicios básicos.
La actividad que desarrolla José es la agricultura, cuenta con predio propio de una  1Has. En el cual esta sembrado de plantaciones de limón en producción, que cosecha y vende semanalmente, esta actividad la realiza hace más de 5 años, además se dedica a la críanza de  ganado ovino y aves de corral como pavos, gallinas, los cuales comercializa en mercado local. Su esposa lo apoya en sus actividades complementarias.
El monto solicitado  del crédito es de 1000 nuevos soles y  será para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de limonero (compra de fertilizantes).
texts.en:
José is a 41 year old married man with two children in his care.  He lives in his own house located in Caserío Pedregal Alto, in Tambogrande District.  José lives in the rural part of the settlement and does not have basic utilities.

The activity José carries out is farming.  He has his own one-hectare parcel of farmland where he’s growing lemons that he harvests and sells weekly.  He’s been in this activity for more than five years.  He also raises sheep and barnyard fowl like turkeys and chickens that he sells in the local market.  His wife helps him with his activities.  

The amount of the requested loan is 1000 new soles that he will use to buy fertilizer to provide maintenance to his lemon crops.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Shirley Antuanet

texts.es:
Shirley es una mujer  de 20 años de edad, es madre soltera y con 01 hijo a su cargo. Vive en casa de sus padres, quienes le brindan su apoyo. Su padre firma como aval en el presente crédito, la casa está ubicada en el caserío Las Mónicas del  Distrito de Tambogrande del departamento de Piura. Ella  vive en la parte  rural del distrito, pero cuenta con servicio de luz.
La actividad que desarrolla Shirley  es la agricultura, pues sus padres le ha dado en herencia anticipada un lote de 0.50 has de terreno agrícola en donde ha sembrado mango y limón en producción. Complementariamente se dedica a la crianza de ganado menor, el cual al alcanzar su peso y tamaño exacto los comercializa en el mercado local.
El monto solicitado del crédito  es de 2,500 nuevos soles lo cual  será para la compra de fertilizantes y mantenimiento del  cultivo de mango y limón, ya que en este aspecto le apoya su padre.
texts.en:
Shirley is a 20 year old woman and a single mother of a son in her care.  She lives in her parents’ house who offer her their support.  Her father is co-signing as guarantor of this loan.  The house is located in Las Mónicas, in Tambogrande District.  She lives in the rural part of the district but does have electricity.

The activity Shirley carries out is farming for her parents have given her a half hectare parcel of land in advance of her inheritance where she’s growing mangoes and lemons.  She also raises minor livestock which she sells in the local market when they reach ideal size and weight.

The amount of the loan requested is 2500 which will be used to buy fertilizer and for maintenance of her lemon and mango crops since she has her father’s support in this respect.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her crops.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luís, esta casado y tiene un hijo con el cual vive en la casa de sus padres ocupando solo una habitación la cual es de adobe, es por eso que solicita el crédito para la construcción de otra habitación para darle más comodidad  a su familia, usando materiales como ladrillo, arena, cemento y otros.
Luís, estudio solo hasta el bachillerato y actualmente percibe ingresos ya que trabaja  más de diez horas como empleado en una empresa privada  pero no cuenta con seguro médico para su familia. 
El sueño de Luís es tener su casa propia para mejorar su calidad de vida y dar más comodidad y seguridad a su familia.
Es la primera vez que trabaja con IMPRO y KIVA.
Por lo general, los clientes de Impro viven en zonas peri urbana de la ciudad de La Paz y El Alto. Las casas donde habitan están compuestas de dos o tres habitaciones sin terminar, a veces sin baño y con pisos de tierra o cemento. Los préstamos que solicitan son para efectuar mejoras en sus viviendas, para poder ofrecer mayor comodidad a sus familiares.
texts.en:
Luís is married and has a son he lives with in his parents’ house occupying a single adobe room which is why he’s asking for a loan to build another room to give his family more comfort using materials like bricks, sand, cement and others.

Luís only studied up to high school and currently earns income because he works more than ten hours as an employee in a private firm but he does not have health insurance.

Luís’ dream is to have a house of his own to improve his quality of life and give more comfort and security to his family.

This is the first time he’s worked with IMPRO and with KIVA.

In general, Impro clients live in the peri-urban zones of the cities of La Paz and El Alto.  The houses they live in have two or three unfinished rooms, sometimes with no bathroom and dirt or cement floors.  The loans they request are to do home improvements to offer more comfort to their families.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Viviana

texts.es:
Viviana, es madre soltera y tiene un hijo con el cual vive en su propia casa; la casa es pequeña y solo tiene dos dormitorios esta ubicada en la zona Mallasilla de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente percibe ingresos ya que trabaja como empleada en una institución privada por más de ocho horas con lo cual solventa todos los gastos ya sean alimenticios y estudios para su hijo.
El crédito lo solicita para la construcción de un garaje en su casa ya que piensa comprar un vehiculo para ahorrar en pasajes por la distancia donde vive.
El sueño de Viviana es comprarse un vehiculo ya que la casa donde vive esta alejada del centro de la ciudad y necesita darle seguridad a su hijo ya que no hay muchos buses hacia su casa mas que todo cuando es muy tarde.
Es la segunda vez que solicita el crédito con IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Viviana is a single mother; she has a son she lives with in her own house.  The house is small and only has two bedrooms.  It’s located in the city of La Paz’s Mallasilla zone.

Currently, she earns income as an employee in a private firm; she works more than 8 hours and is able to cover all expenses related to food and schooling for her son.

She is asking for the loan to build a garage at home because she’s thinking about buying a vehicle to save on transportation costs because of the distance she lives at.

Viviana’s dream is to buy a vehicle because the house she lives in is far from downtown and she needs to give her son security because there aren’t many buses going toward her house especially when it’s very late.

This is her second loan request to IMPRO and first to KIVA.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Fredesman

texts.es:
Fredesman es un hombre de 33 años de edad, estado civil conviviente, con 02 hijos a su cargo. Vive  en casa  propia  con su cónyuge y su hijo. La casa está ubicada en el Caserío La Cruceta del distrito de Tambogrande y cuenta con servicio de luz, el lugar es una comunidad pequeña de aproximadamente 100 familias.
La actividad que desarrolla Fredesman  es la crianza y venta  de ganado menor (ovino, caprinos, porcino, caprinos y aves de corral), los cuales al alcanzar tamaño y peso exacto los comercializa en el mercado local. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace 5 años aproximadamente, el negocio esta ubicado en su domicilio y aprendió esta actividad de sus padres, es decir conoce a la perfección el rubro. Complementariamente se dedica a ala agricultura donde cuenta con 0.80 ha de terreno agrícola que tienen instalado limón y viene cosechando semanalmente lo que le permite tener ingresos adicionales.
El monto del crédito solicitado   es de 2500 nuevos soles, los cuales se emplearán para invertir en la  compra de alimento balanceado para su ganado menor y la compra de fertilizantes para su cultivo de limón, está inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Fredesman is a 33-year-old man who lives with his common-law wife and has two children in his care.  He lives with his wife and children in his own home which is located in the small village of 8-4 Cruceta, in Tambogrande district.  The house has electricity.  This is a small community of approximately 100 families.

Fredesman's business is raising and selling livestock (sheep, goats, pigs and farmyard birds).  When they reach an appropriate size and weight he sells them in the local market.  He has been in this business for approximately five years.  His business is located at home and he learned it from his parents.  As a result, he knows the business inside out.  In addition, Fredesman also farms crops.  He has 0.8 hectares of farmland where he grows lemons which he harvests weekly.  This makes him additional income. 

Fredesman has requested a loan for 2,500 soles which he will invest in buying nutritionally-balanced feed for his livestock and fertilizers for his lemon crop.  This investment will allow him to continue growing in his business.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally-balanced animal feed and also fertilizers for his lemon crop

loans.name: Marilin

texts.es:
Marilin  es una mujer de 25 años de edad, estado civil conviviente, con 01 hijos a su cargo. Vive  en casa  propia  con su cónyuge y su hijo. La casa está ubicada en el Caserío Guaraguaos del distrito de Tambogrande y cuenta con servicio de luz, el lugar es una comunidad pequeña de aproximadamente 100 familias.
